page.title: 08SPORTS FACILITIES IN SEND
page.content: For public use, there is a recreation ground with a football pitch, tennis court and children's play area with swings, roundabout and climbing frame. Among local clubs is a football club for both adults and boys. The latter compete in two local leagues and played a tournament in Holland in 1984. Send Cricket Club (celebrating their centenary in 1986) are sited at Sendholme. A gymnastics Club is held weekly using the facilities at St.Bede's Middle School in Send. There are riding stables on Send Hill. The nearest Leisure Centre is in Old Woking (3km) and swimming pools in Woking (5km) and Guildford (9km).
